data.message: I recently became the administrator of my work location Facebook page, North Central Florida Baptist Association.  The old administrators have left and their email/passwords do not work.  I have to access the page from my personal page.  How do we regain log in access to this account?

replies.message: Hi Steven. We cannot grant you a role on a Page and we cannot change your role on a Page.  We recommend reaching out to the current or previous admin to have them grant you access by assigning you an admin role. You can find the steps to adding an admin to a Page in our Help Center: http://bit.ly/2icYMBr. If you can't contact the previous admin, or if the Page no longer has an admin, you will not be able to regain access to the Page. You can find information about creating a new Page here:https://www.facebook.com/help/104002523024878. -Tenaya

I need to be able to send and accept friend requests for the North Central Florida Baptist Association.  Do I just delete the page and start over?  Will it let me delete the account and then add it back in with the same name?
